name: GOOD DUNGEON
description:
You know only one thing: you're looking for BONESETTER. Whatever or whoever that is. The dungeon is good, and deep, your sword is irrelevant, and though you may not admit it, you are awfully lonely.

[+]

CREDITS
additional art assets: Davit "Kronbits" Masia
fonts: Somepx
music: Three Red Hearts - Prepare to Dev by Abstraction
additional music: Art Festivale by Aaron Cohen
dialogue based on ChapelR's Say macro

[+]
